short_description: Discover Colombia, a vibrant South American nation known for its world-famous coffee, emeralds, diverse landscapes, and rich cultural heritage. Explore the colorful cities of Bogot√° and Cartagena, experience the warmth of Colombian culture, and immerse yourself in the natural beauty of this Andean country.

health.tap_water_safety: Generally safe in major cities, bottled water recommended in some areas
alcohol_info: It is prohibited to sell, serve, or offer alcohol beverages to anyone under the age of 18
Alcohol can be purchased from licensed venues, supermarkets, and shops
Colombia is known for its aguardiente and rum

tipping.hotels: Small tips for porters and housekeeping are appreciated
tipping.guides: 10% tip is appreciated for tour guides
tipping.restaurants: 10% tip is customary for good service, though service charge may be included
tipping.taxis: Rounding up the fare is common

weather.title: Colombia has diverse climates ranging from tropical along the coast to temperate in the highlands, with weather varying significantly by altitude. The country experiences two distinct seasons: a dry season and a wet season, though timing varies by region.

when_to_visit.title: Dry Season
when_to_visit.time_period: December to March, July to August
when_to_visit.short_description: Cooler and drier weather, making this the best time to visit. Perfect for exploring cities, visiting coffee regions, and outdoor activities. Ideal conditions for sightseeing and cultural experiences

when_to_visit.title: Shoulder Season
when_to_visit.time_period: April to June, September to November
when_to_visit.short_description: Transition periods with occasional rain showers. Still manageable for travel, but be prepared for some rainfall. Good time to visit with fewer crowds

when_to_visit.title: Wet Season
when_to_visit.time_period: April to May, October to November
when_to_visit.short_description: Heavy rainfall in many regions. Challenging conditions for travel, with flooding possible in some areas. Lush green landscapes but difficult for outdoor activities

weather.best_time: The best time to visit Colombia is during the dry seasons from December to March and July to August when the weather is cooler and drier, making it ideal for exploring cities, visiting coffee regions, and outdoor activities
